page.title: 02Typical Day Of A Teenager
page.content: My name's Trudi Ward, I'm thirteen and I live in Hall Green, near Wakefield. I'm woken by music blasting every morning. I get washed, teeth brushed and dressed. Then I have breakfast, gather the days kit and put it in my bag before setting out in coat and shoes. After calling at my friend's house Cath and I go to the newsagent's. When the whistle's blown the school playground is cleared of children. We have four lessons a day with breaks after each lesson. We leave school at 3:40p.m. and go home. At home I get changed into jodhpurs and set of to see Polo,my pony. I catch her and give her an apple as a titbit. Then I give her a good brush and tack her up. Polo and I go out for a good ride and I bring her back. After that I have some tea,do my homework,have a bath and go to bed.
